"Subdue the fleeing $(0)":
"Pursue the $(0) flight and defeat $(1)!
You will fail if $(2) or more get away."

"逃走する$(0)を$(1)体倒せ！
$(2)体以上、逃がすと失敗。"

"Fleeing $(0) readings have been spotted.
To investigate this behavior, we need you to
subdue any you find and gather data before they get away."

"$(0) detected. An urgent subdual
request has been issued. We need your help!"

"/face2 Data on the $(0) has been
gathered. Thank you for your cooperation."

"The $(0) readings have disappeared.
We failed to gather the necessary data,
but thank you for your efforts."

"逃走する$(0)の
存在を確認。奇行の原因調査のため
逃走前の討伐回収を願います。"

"$(0)の存在を
確認しました。早急な討伐要請が
下っています。よろしくお願いします！"

"/face2 $(0)のデータ
取得完了、協力感謝します。"

"$(0)、ロスト。
データ取得は失敗しましたが
ここまでの協力、感謝します。"
